{{Infobox college lacrosse team |name = Cornell Big Red |founded = 1892 |image = CornellBigRed.png |image_size = 150px |caption = |university = Cornell University |conference = [[Ivy League]] |division = |location = [[Ithaca, New York]] |coach = Ben DeLuca |tenure = since 2010 |stadium = [[Schoellkopf Field]] |capacity = 25,597 |nickname = Big Red |colors = Carnelian and White
{{colorbox|#b31b1b}} {{colorbox|#ffffff}} |pre_NCAA= 1903, 1907, 1914, 1916 |NCAA_champion = 1971, 1976, 1977 |NCAA_runner = 1978, 1987, 1988, 2009 |NCAA_semi = 1971, 1974, 1975, 1976, 1977, 1978, 1982, 1987, 1988, 2007, 2009, 2010 |NCAA_quarter = 1987, 1988, 2002, 2004, 2005, 2007, 2009, 2010, 2011 |NCAA_tourney = 1971, 1974, 1975, 1976, 1977, 1978, 1979, 1980, 1982, 1983, 1987, 1988, 1989, 1995, 2000, 2002, 2004, 2005, 2006, 2007, 2008, 2009, 2010, 2011 |conf_tourney = 2011 |conf_champion = 2011 }} The '''Cornell Big Red Men's Lacrosse''' team represents [[Cornell University]] in [[National Collegiate Athletic Association]] (NCAA) [[Division I (NCAA)|Division I]] men's [[college lacrosse|lacrosse]]. Cornell competes as a member of the [[Ivy League]], of which they have won 23 conference championships. The Big Red have appeared in the [[NCAA Men's Lacrosse Championship|NCAA tournament]] 22 times, reaching the NCAA finals in 2009 before losing to Syracuse in overtime 10-9.[http://cornellbigred.com/documents/2008/10/30/2009.MLax.QFs.pdf 2009 Cornell Men's Lacrosse Quick Facts] (PDF), Cornell University, 2009. Cornell maintains [[CornellâHobart rivalry|one of the oldest rivalries]] in college lacrosse with the [[Hobart and William Smith Colleges|Hobart College Statesmen]].[http://www.hwsathletics.com/news/2010/2/24/HLX_0224104159.aspx Hobart-Cornell lax opener delayed, moved to Carrier Dome], Hobart & William Smith Colleges, February 24, 2010, retrieved May 31, 2010. [[CornellâPrinceton lacrosse rivalry|Their main Ivy League rivalry]] is with [[Princeton Tigers men's lacrosse|Princeton]]. Cornell's media guides claim four pre NCAA era and three NCAA national championships,{{cite web|url=http://cornellbigred.com/documents/2009/2/6/09.Mlax.History.pdf?id=1667|title=2009Cornell Big Red Menâs Lacrosse|accessdate=2011-11-26|publisher=CornellBigRed.com}} but the [[United States Intercollegiate Lacrosse Association]] only lists one of these pre-NCAA championships.{{cite web|url=http://www.usila.org/NCAAChampionHistory.htm|title=The NCAA Menâs Lacrosse Championship formerly known as the Wingate Memorial Champion|accessdate=2011-11-26|publisher=[[United States Intercollegiate Lacrosse Association]]}} [[Image:Cornell_lacrosse_2004.jpg|thumb|left|The 2004 Cornell lacrosse team]] ==External links== *[http://cornellbigred.com/sports/2008/9/10/sidebar_428.aspx?path=mlax Cornell Men's Lacrosse Media Guides] ==References== {{Reflist}} {{Ivy League men's lacrosse}} [[Category:College lacrosse teams in the United States]] [[Category:Cornell Big Red lacrosse|Men's]] [[Category:New York lacrosse teams]] {{lacrosse-stub}}
